Dear Cantera-Users/Developers ,

I want to run some equilibrium calculations to estimate the thermodynamical
soot limits for a gasification reaction regime. In the
defining-phases-tutorial is some information that Cantera can work with
several phases. My question how do I set up a multi phase equilibrium
calculation with a gasphase containing a few species like CO, CH4, CO2,
H2 .. and a stoichiometric_solid consisting of graphite.  Thank you very
much.

      Albrecht
